DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate effect koji-extracted beverage ferment Pediococcus pentosaceus LP28 BMI body fat overweight subject .
DOC.brief_title: Anti-obesity Effect Koji-extracted Beverage Fermented With Pediococcus Pentosaceus LP28
DOC.criteria: BMI 2530 kg/m2 Taking drug functional food may affect body weight body fat Pregnant nursing child Participation clinical trial within 90 day commencement trial Renal hepatic dysfunction Heart disease History severe disease and/or major surgery
